20101228022922.000|20101228022924.000|CC1|FOR THE RECORD BOOKS.           
20101228022924.000|20101228022926.000|CC1|IT DUMPED 32 INCHES OF SNOW IN  
20101228022926.000|20101228022929.000|CC1|SOME PLACES, AND CONCEALED CARS 
20101228022929.000|20101228022930.000|CC1|UNDER DRIFTS FIVE FEET HIGH.    
20101228022930.000|20101228022933.000|CC1|ALL OF IT DELIVERED BY FIERCE   
20101228022933.000|20101228022934.000|CC1|WIND, SOME GUSTS TOPPED 80 MILES
20101228022934.000|20101228022936.000|CC1|AN HOUR.                        
20101228022936.000|20101228022938.000|CC1|THE SNOW AND WIND MADE TRAVEL   
20101228022938.000|20101228022939.000|CC1|DIFFICULT AND DANGEROUS, BLAMED 
20101228022939.000|20101228022940.000|CC1|FOR AT LEAST A DOZEN DEATHS ON  
20101228022940.000|20101228022941.000|CC1|THE ROAD.                       
20101228022941.000|20101228022943.000|CC1|AIR TRAVEL STOPPED.             
20101228022943.000|20101228022945.000|CC1|ABOUT 6,000 FLIGHTS HAVE BEEN   
20101228022945.000|20101228022946.000|CC1|CANCELED TURNING AIRPORT        
20101228022946.000|20101228022947.000|CC1|TERMINALS INTO MAKESHIFT        
20101228022947.000|20101228022949.000|CC1|DORMITORIES.

20101228022954.000|20101228022955.000|CC1|AND A LOOK AT WHERE THIS STORM  
20101228022955.000|20101228022956.000|CC1|HAS BEEN OVER THE LAST 24 HOURS 
20101228022956.000|20101228022958.000|CC1|EXPLAINS WHY.

20101228022959.000|20101228023002.000|CC1|MORE SNOW.

20101228023004.000|20101228023004.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:30:00 of 1:00:00

20101228023129.000|20101228023132.000|CC1|EASTERN SEA BOARD.

20101228024825.000|20101228024826.000|CC1|LEOPARD OUT OF HIDING.

20101228024827.000|20101228024830.000|CC1|INTO A CROWD THEN IT ATTACKED

20101228024832.000|20101228024832.000|CC1|TORCH.

20101228024834.000|20101228024835.000|CC1|ATTACKED AT LEAST SEVEN PEOPLE  
20101228024835.000|20101228024837.000|CC1|IN A NEARBY VILLAGE, IS STILL ON
20101228024837.000|20101228024839.000|CC1|THE LOOSE.

20101228024841.000|20101228024842.000|CC1|TURNING POINT IN THE WAR BETWEEN
20101228024843.000|20101228024843.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:48:00 of 1:00:00
20101228024842.000|20101228024845.000|CC1|THE STATES, BUT AFTER 147 YEARS,

20101228024848.000|20101228024849.000|CC1|MESSAGE IN A BOTTLE.

20101228024856.000|20101228024858.000|CC1|VICKSBURG WAITING FOR

20101228024904.000|20101228024905.000|CC1|FROM THIS SIDE OF THE RIVER."   
20101228024905.000|20101228024908.000|CC1|IT WAS DATED JULY 4, 1863.

20101228025013.000|20101228025014.000|CC1|                   e Announcer e
20101228025014.000|20101228025015.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20101228025015.000|20101228025017.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery,e
20101228025017.000|20101228025017.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20101228025017.000|20101228025020.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20101228025020.000|20101228025020.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101228025020.000|20101228025023.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101228025023.000|20101228025025.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101228025025.000|20101228025027.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101228025027.000|20101228025027.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101228025027.000|20101228025028.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101228025028.000|20101228025028.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101228025028.000|20101228025031.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101228025031.000|20101228025031.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101228025031.000|20101228025033.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101228025033.000|20101228025035.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101228025035.000|20101228025035.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101228025035.000|20101228025036.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101228025036.000|20101228025036.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101228025036.000|20101228025039.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101228025039.000|20101228025039.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101228025039.000|20101228025042.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101228025042.000|20101228025042.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101228025042.000|20101228025045.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101228025045.000|20101228025045.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101228025045.000|20101228025046.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101228025046.000|20101228025046.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101228025046.000|20101228025048.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101228025046.000|20101228025046.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:50:00 of 1:00:00
20101228025048.000|20101228025049.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101228025049.000|20101228025049.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101228025049.000|20101228025052.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101228025052.000|20101228025052.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101228025052.000|20101228025053.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101228025053.000|20101228025055.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101228025055.000|20101228025055.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101228025055.000|20101228025057.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101228025057.000|20101228025057.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101228025057.000|20101228025059.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101228025059.000|20101228025059.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101228025059.000|20101228025101.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101228025101.000|20101228025103.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101228025103.000|20101228025103.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101228025103.000|20101228025105.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101228025105.000|20101228025105.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101228025105.000|20101228025108.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101228025108.000|20101228025108.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101228025108.000|20101228025110.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101228025110.000|20101228025110.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101228025110.000|20101228025111.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101228025111.000|20101228025111.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101228025111.000|20101228025114.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101228025114.000|20101228025114.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101228025114.000|20101228025116.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101228025116.000|20101228025118.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101228025118.000|20101228025120.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101228025120.000|20101228025120.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially
